heading: ACF Winter |2009 | Editor's Packet 1 | 15 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: The velocity dispersions of their stars are related to their luminosity by the Faber-Jackson relation. For ten points each: [10] Identify these objects, examples of which include M87, also known as Virgo A, as well as M32 and M49. They typically have smooth brightness profiles and a regular shape.
